website_summaries.verdict: These slip-on sneakers provide wonderful footwear for walking, running and other physical activities.
pros: Synthetic suede sneakers are stain-resistant and constructed to last
Include a unique dual-vent design that helps the sneakers dry quickly
Equipped with fold-down heel cups, ensuring you will have no trouble taking the sneakers on and off as needed
Feature soft tap heels to reduce the risk of abrasions
cons: Flimsy in comparison to similar options
Sneaker insoles may fall out at times

customer_reviews.title: They're water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a casual type of athletic shoes. They fit fine and look great, but they should make it clearer that these are completely see-thru. As in, there essentially water shoes. 100% mesh top. If that's what you want, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: mister c

customer_reviews.title: Very happy....
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY WIDE feet and a high inStep. It's hard to find ANY SHOE that fits and doesn't cut off the circulation in my feet so, I always order a size larger than the size chart. So... I have just opened the Amazon package and tried these on. Woot! Woot! They are UBER light, very flexible and fit like a dream. I will get be getting a backup pair.....
customer_reviews.author: ChefBoy RD

customer_reviews.title: Very breathable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and breathable. Probably the only shoes I'll buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: how bad could cheap ones really be
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as part of me "Shoes are overpriced, how bad could cheap ones really be?" phase. Well maybe my expectations are just ridiculous, but these were not a valid alternative of "normal" shoes. It was humorous how cheap the white bottoms felt and the top of the shoe was flimsy fabric, as in you could make the shoe go (and stay) completely flat if you press down on it. Some will give me grief about my expectations for a $20 pair of shoes, but they failed in my "cheap alternative shoes" experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Duff2348

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Look very nice, are a bit lighter grey than I thought, which is fine. Super lightweight and good for running. I wish they came in half sizes. I feel like they may wear out quickly but I don't know yet. Overall very nice though, I love how easily they slip on and feel good. The material is very thin so would not work for rain but are great for hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is absolutely great! I have been in construction my entire life
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is absolutely great! I have been in construction my entire life, and have to wear work boots all the time. It is so nice to come home and change into these shoes. They are lightweight and so comfortable. They let your feet breathe and just so nice to walk around in comfort. I hightly recommmend to others to buy these shoes, they are a steal especially if your like me and on your feet most of the day. What a relief it is, to have them. I wear them more than my nike jordans that i spent over a hundred dollars for. The price is great, and the feeling is overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap un-wearable shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look ok, and the size is correct, but unless you plan to be stationary you'll get about 2 or 3 days maximum wear out of these before the insoles come out and / or the arches of your feet are blistered and raw. I used them for the gym, to lift (not even walk other than walking from machine to machine) and they become quite uncomfortable / unwearable very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes if you have issues like I do. I can't wear anything with seaming across the top of the foot. These don't have it. I have wide feet (from wearing flip flops all the time), and it's difficult to find something to accommodate that doesn't rub or hurt. These don't. They are mesh. My inserts fit in them perfectly, and I now have shoes I can exercise and walk in. I walk 5 miles every day and my feet haven't bothered me since I purchased these shoes. I purchased an 8 wide.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy on easy off if you trash the shoelace.
customer_reviews.text: There are definately the lightest sneakers that I have ever owned. The high point on the sneaker is lined with elastic and fits snug. In fact snug enough to remove the shoe lace. In fat I use them around the house and yard as slippers. You should be aware that this item offers very little support. From the hardly noticeable arch support around the heel there is a very light lining, and from there foreward there is only the mesh and nothing to keep out dirt. I have worn them with or without no see socks. I'm happy with them and the fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: JJV at FLA

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE SNEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SNEAKS! I first bought a gray pair. When they came and I felt how light they were, I was very skeptical. But after wearing them for two weeks, including 8 hours of walking at Knott's Scary Farm, I fell in love with them. I bought the black pair as well, and I may buy an extra set of each for when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: AndyK

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: Really light shoes and they are great for running except for the small problem that the insole of the shoe is not glued on and for me they just moved back when i was running. i just simply took them off and the shoes still feels great and doesn't bother me at all. if you are looking for a really light shoe than this is it and it is also very breathable which i really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Jose b.

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little cheap, but a pretty good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I am a server at a busy restaurant chain and I needed some new shoes for my long doubles, so I gave these a try. They fit as expected, wide shoe with plenty of wiggle room, and the mesh lining offers a great breeze while walking. These shoes should probably be worn with socks since they are kind of see through. The soles feel sort of thin but I found they offered me enough support. Overall a decent shoe, it doesn’t feel the most high quality but it does feel okay.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great super-light shoe, lacks good insole
customer_reviews.text: I have a treadmill desk and use it every day for 10-20k steps each day so wanted a lightweight shoe. This definitely fit the bill. The only shortcoming was that my feet hurt like crazy after using it because of the lack of insole/arch support. I pulled in my insoles for my Brookes Pureflow and threw them in there and it immediately solved the problem. As other commenters have reviewed, the shoe is merely mesh, so your socks will be fully visible.
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Not meant for excessive walking/running.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! However, the padding is cheap and becomes loose after wearing it daily for a month. I had to buy my own padding. These are great casual shoes, but should not be used for excessive walking/running. Nonetheless, I’ve received great comments from friends on these shoes and very breathable. Would recommend because of affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Angler

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes! They look good and they just slip on! If I'm ever running late or just rushing out the door, these are perfect. They are comfortable and sized well. They are VERY lightweight and you don't want to wear them when it's wet outside because you will have soaking socks. These are not really meant for support or long hours on your feet, but they are comfortable. And for $20? You can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice! But tearing already
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice! But tearing already Great errand shoe til the inside sole piece slides all over the place so you have to get rid of it. Sad face
customer_reviews.author: TVW

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and easy to maneuver when put on or taking off
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for sports related use but because they are very breathable I ended up using them for work. Very comfy and easy to maneuver when put on or taking off. Love Em@!
customer_reviews.author: TSF

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and wide mesh
customer_reviews.text: The material was thin enough I could see my toes or socks through them. The fact that the tip wasn't deep enough and made my toes stick up didn't help either. I've always had trouble of shoes being too big, but this is a first of a shoe being a bit small for him
customer_reviews.author: Consumerism

customer_reviews.title: Buy These, they're GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These are great sneakers, and it's true, almost like wearing nothing. Love that I can wear thick black sox with them and the comfort is even more amazing because the extra cushion the sox provide. Love how they are just too easy to slip on and off. Will buy more for family, they all thought they were great, and the price is wonderful ..Bye.
customer_reviews.author: oznerol

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Meet Purpose, But Decent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I returned the shoes because the soles were made out of a material that would not work for my intention. It is more of a plastic than a rubber but I think they would be great for water shoes or activities that you would require a lot of breathability. They were fairly comfortable but I wouldn't want to stay on them for more then 4-5 hours or so at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Haeven

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet new kicks I got
customer_reviews.text: Came in quick. Mesh and wetsuit like material. Soles are great and gripping of shoes are awesome. I literally feel like im bouncing as I walk and I can work 8 hr shifts in the food business and my feet still feel good! The mesh allow my pretty good air flow ;) Nice price and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Karoline H.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I stand on my feet all day for work, these shoes are very lightweight and breath very well, very comfortable too. My only complaint would be, the area where the laces feed through is not very strong, I’m sure if I pulled a bit tighter they’d rip. All in all I’d recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jef

customer_reviews.title: Best crappy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best crappy shoes you can buy! I buy these because I work in an environment that destroys nice shoes. Paint, mud, tools, running, high impact, sports, jumping. They’re comfy and amazing for 6 months before they start to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Barreras

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable, inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for martial arts practice. They are a mesh, so not waterproof. Very comfortable, flexible and have a "mat safe" rubber sole. Read other reviews so bought a 1/2 size up and fit great. Good for athletics, but wouldn't wear all the time, little ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Digital Design Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable summer shoe for the low price
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable summer shoe for the low price. Went a half size high just in case, but it's too large for comfort, so I had to return and do a half size low, so maybe consider that before ordering. But, they're extremely light and feel great with or without socks. The gray is pretty see-through, but I don't mind that. Love them for travel and so forth.
customer_reviews.author: swingset

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great style, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to buy some more pairs from this brand, now that this first pair passed the test. Looks and fits well. Durable, breathable mesh upper. Thick but flexible sole with grippy tread / traction. I've been using them as walking shoes. These are not "athletic" shoes...not for running, cross training, or weightlifting.
customer_reviews.author: LvgZombie

customer_reviews.title: See through front. Super light , it might have cheap materials in it.
customer_reviews.text: Its super flexible, and weighs nothing. So there might be discomfort as you don't feel it securely placed on your foot as you walk around. Also the front is netted basically, so if you have white socks, everyone will know.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Seyfried

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Look good
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Look good. Hope they last a while but very light. Good to stand on the corner with. Nothing else. Maybe a sit down game of cards. Don’t walk to much ,you toes will pop through mesh. Good water shoe to. I’m crippled so I like them. Look great
customer_reviews.author: Integrated Act

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe but don't seem all that durable.I wear them now and again but not as an everyday shoe. They kinda of fit like a water shoe with see thru mesh. I bought them for a family trip to disneyworld .Knew I'd be walking alot and wanted something comfortable They were cool and comfortable in the hot FLA weather.
customer_reviews.author: JSP

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this purchase. I got these shoes for my teenager to wear to work. He works in a restaurant with fryers and such. He loves these shoes; because they are stylish, lightweight, and comfortable. His coworker asked where he got them so that he could purchase this product too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fits good and I like that it’s a slip on and ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits good and I like that it’s a slip on and very light weight unfortunately I didn’t like the fact that there’s not much protection for your foot the top is a mesh netting so if you’re going to be outside or working With any hazards at all I would not recommend it kind of like a slipper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Though it IS Very Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: FITS AS EXPECTED, but I was Expecting a Somewhat more DURABLE SHOE for the Price. This Shoe BORDERLINES on HOUSE SHOES, and I REALLY Don't Expect it To Last Very Well. Though it IS Very Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MusicMan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy so far around the house
customer_reviews.text: Have told my Mom don't buy shoes on line, and here I go and bought these! They arrived and the fit right away, no break in for my experience. Nice and comfy so far around the house, though I haven't worn them for long periods or attempted to walk around shopping. so I have more to learn about these, but out of the box (or bag) they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: GregArias

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe for the price. Little loose up front, could be from the lightweight material. Really nice looking shoe. Would not recomend wearing in the fall or winter! And also they are pretty transparent. Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are nice, lightweight and so comfortable. My husband has issues with sweaty feet and was looking for shoes to help with that issue. These shoes fit the bill perfectly. They are lightweight and the mesh allows for optimal airflow. They are great for everyday use and the quality of the show is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mari E.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pair for. Great shoes for gym and very lightweight. I would suggest using these as water shoes as they are a mesh material more than noticed in the photos and without socks you can see your feet haha
customer_reviews.author: Socially Awkward

customer_reviews.title: What you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. The top of shoe falls flat when you take your foot out. Comfortable simple and stylish which was my main concern. Would not recommend if you need durable running shoes
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but good
customer_reviews.text: Great summer shoes or travel in the cold months to warm vacation spots. They're not long lasting but they will survive one season. They are extremely comfortable with no socks. The mesh is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel David Webster

customer_reviews.title: The shoe itself is not bad but the add is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is not bad but the add is deceptive. These are not for running. I ran track when i was younger. If you Google swimming shoes you will find this type of shoe. These would not last long if you are running in them.
customer_reviews.author: abner nunez

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for everyday standing, walking and working.. They are easy to clean and very comfortable.. It's like wearing a pair of socks without shoes on.. I like them better than my seventy dollar Nike knit shoes..
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight and keeps feet nice and cool. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, except for the insoles
customer_reviews.text: These are very light and comfortable. You will need to replace the soft insoles that come with it as they tend to slip and come out while wearing. I am only wearing thes on the beach and for quick walks to the store or walking the dog. If not for the insoles it would be a 5, I just want them to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Logan

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but the insoles are absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but the insoles are absolute garbage. Seriously. Buy some orthotic insoles and put those in. Your feet will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: tushaar venkateswaran

customer_reviews.title: It is a decent sneaker, that costs $25 or ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent sneaker, that costs $25 or around that. It's rather tight around the upper part, under the ankle and they are very light. All in all, it's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: V. Sturza

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but not dark grey
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and the shoes fit pretty well. Only problem with my pair is that they don't look as dark as what's advertised. Outdoors they look light grey, but in darker areas could pass for what's in the picture. Just be aware it might be a lighter color if you buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Malik H.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Starr comfort,  style, @ breathable
customer_reviews.text: These were way more than I expected when it comes to comfort, flexabilty, and especially breatheablity. I got compliments on them from the moment I put them on. They're uniquely different @ stylish. You can't go wrong with these for summer...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Durability, & Appearance exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They don't look like cheap shoes from Amazon. They fit well and are very durable. I AM DEFINITELY BUYING THESE AGAIN. After a year of constant use, I now push mow the yard in these shoes and they still have not came apart and for what it's worth, they are still really comfortable. Very Durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Batts

customer_reviews.title: They feel nice look nice and are very nicely priced.Worn down a little bit faster than I like
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and feels nice just worn down a bit quick, but for the price it's very much worth it. I do walk 11 to 15 miles a day so that could be a factor....LMAO
customer_reviews.author: CHIZZY-X

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable. I wouldn't run in them but I'm old ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. I wouldn't run in them but I'm old and need more protection in order to run. I loved driving in them and will be taking them on the road in a week to see how they feel after days of driving.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney O. Lavigne

customer_reviews.title: Good slippers
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. If you want slip on shoes. Not really for running however I do run in them with no problems. Oh and they are see through for sure. Very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too comfortable, otherwise, it's OK
customer_reviews.text: Very light and excellent ventilation. Sizes seems to be 1/2 point larger that standard US. The sole has not cushion whatsoever. Just to be used for very short walks, if your feet are sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. Little large
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but they fit a bit large. I wear a size 9 normally so I got a size 8.5 since the didn't offer 9. It was still a bit large. My foot moves around inside it when i walk and especially when I step sideways or go up or down a hill. Other than that, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly...fits welll...very light...foot is able to breath with the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesh shoes
customer_reviews.text: Was going to use these as outdoor shoes. The mesh of the shoes is very thin. Any dirt, grass and rocks pour into your shoe.
customer_reviews.author: goucherman

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: great shoe for the money. comes in a clear bag with no tags but I could tell they were new. very easy to get on and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Toddzilla

customer_reviews.title: These are my sons favorite. Super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are my sons favorite. Super lightweight. Looks great and great quality. Should make in other colors. Will buy all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mayda Wiltz

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Although this product looks nice and promising, the material is very cheap. I hadn't worn these shoes for an entire month yet, when the sole from the left shoe came out and I was never able to put it back in. Also, the mesh on the shoe made a huge hole in itself. I guess you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Ramses

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good upgrade from a flip flop to be around the house. Don’t expect to run in them or
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I like to walk around bare feet and these are perfect when you are at someone else house. I even wear them out to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Harris

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Summer Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my English husband to help him keep cool in the southern Mississippi heat. He loves them. Worn without socks they're cool, very comfortable, and light as a feather. They aren't the most substantial shoes in the world and won't last for years but, for the price, they're excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes they fit well are light weight and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes they fit well are light weight and you can actually feel the air flow around your feet as you walk no sweaty feet here buy them you’ll love em
customer_reviews.author: james g.

customer_reviews.title: Nice slip on
customer_reviews.text: Not a shoe i would run in, very nice for a casual, around the house shoe... lots of toe room
customer_reviews.author: Jkowalski

customer_reviews.title: Good product for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. These shoes are light and comfy for my feet but built strong enough to let me do some jogging with my dogs without feeling that they will break anytime. The price is just fine. I will be ordering more pairs soon.
customer_reviews.author: OaxTejano Kindle

customer_reviews.title: very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Spend a few more bucks and get a quality pair of slip ons, the bottoms are cheap plastic, not rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great only that i miss the size
customer_reviews.text: great only that i miss the size, yet ok in texture and quality. so i did order new one with appropriate size this time around
customer_reviews.author: karvee kolliemelen

customer_reviews.title: Open mesh
customer_reviews.text: Light weight , totally open mesh fabric: great ventilation ! Seems well built , great for light walking Love them ! Ps : great price too
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly light weight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how little these shoes weigh, and the mesh really does help keep your feet cooler and the soles are nicely cushioned. Quite a bargain for less than $24!
customer_reviews.author: BKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great show. Weighs near nothing, and comfy. Looks good too. Inexpensive, and cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I work at a warehouse, were I walk about 15 miles a day and I wear these everyday. They are very light, and breathable. For the price, these are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Cool Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes. Super light-weight. Super comfortable . Look Smart, Cool Sneakers. But the shoes are just soft cloth on the top , so definitely don't let anyone step on your toes, it will hurt! :D
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good multi purpose shoe
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are a great buy. They can be worn as regular casual shoes, swimming shoes and house slippers. The reason for a 4 star and not a five is because the soles could be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hot Summers when Flip Flops just won’t do. . .
customer_reviews.text: Very light and airy. I hate driving in flip flops and these fit the bill nicely. After a day of walking the golf course these fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: High Plains Drifter

customer_reviews.title: I love these Juan shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these Juan shoes. They are light, not slippery, great look and comfortable. I have nothing else to say but excellent walking sneakers. I will buy again and highly recommended. Thanx
customer_reviews.author: Gnostic200 M

customer_reviews.title: A Blessing 😇
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the shoe for my godmother. Her feet swells and comfort is what she has desired. What happiness this shoe has given her. She's proud, satisfied, and extremely overjoyed. Thank you for such a wonderful shoe.
customer_reviews.author: EMP

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: When these are described as very light, it may be an understatement. May not turn out too durable but they are cool and comfortable even on my odd feet.
customer_reviews.author: mary ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Non slip my ass
customer_reviews.text: These are good breathable shoes but not even close to non slip resistant. First day I got them not even 20 min wearing them, I slipped and busted my ass. If you want non slips. These aren't the way to go
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: They are great
customer_reviews.text: They are super comfortable and they are not slippery, I use them at work in a resutrant and I never have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Gorata

customer_reviews.title: Watershoes with laces
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, you might as well being wearing extra socks.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: It is an open mesh design would be great for really hot days
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought. It is an open mesh design would be great for really hot days. Not a multi-season shoe. Treads are also a bit hard for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: eagle252

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable nice to come home and put these on catch myself wearing these alot
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: Great value and comfort. I even wear it in a suit.
customer_reviews.author: Tinymay

customer_reviews.title: ... these for the gym for Zumba and they are great love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the gym for Zumba and they are great love these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Debbie johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have wide feet, and on top of that have developed bunions. These are the only shoes that don't hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fauth

customer_reviews.title: I really like them. They're light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. They're light and comfortable. Exactly as described. the front part is like a thick mesh. Very breathable for sure. It's only been about a month since I purchased and they're still holding together quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Miramontes Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers but replace the Scholl's.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are cheaply made but that's what this price point gets you. Perfect back up running shoes but if you're going to use these as your primary, spend $10 and change the soles. Buy some active doctor scholls.
customer_reviews.author: Ray P

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. Very comfortable. I purchased the grey ones and will get the black ones to. Love them. I am a courier who walks a lot and these are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: lisacro

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight these shoes are. Great fit, look goid. Im on my feet alot and these are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: CT915

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes ... Exactly like the description.. they are more like water shoes then anything, but they have a great rubber bottom.. the only problem I had was that the soals are not glued and they come out almost every time you take them off. Great lightweight shoe !
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Order 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I am 9.5 in Nike. For Juan I ordered a 9 and it fits great. It is worthy every penny. Really fresh and light. It overall, I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: onlycparra

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, style and fit
customer_reviews.text: This product is very comfortable and easy to wear. Will order another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: The insoles need to be glued in because they move around
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several pairs of these for myself and Friends they're very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as the Juan shoes with the stripe
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as the Juan shoes with the stripe. The bubble soul is a bit weird to walk on. But for the price they're not bad.
customer_reviews.author: ab

customer_reviews.title: These shoes would be amazing if the insoles were even REMOTELY comfortable or would ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes would be amazing if the insoles were even REMOTELY comfortable or would stay in place. They are not attached at all. 10 steps and they twist out from under the foot. Would rate the shoes a solid 5 but the construction is simply cheap cheap cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Price doesnt dictate comfort
customer_reviews.text: Run a bit big but they are VERY comfortable! Ive run, lifted, walked in them and my feet werent bothered.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieD

customer_reviews.title: Not a rubber sole - More so foam
customer_reviews.text: It’s like a slippery harder foam on the bottom. I’m not sure how long they will last but they are mesh on top and breathe great for the gym and wearing without socks. Nifty shoe but don’t expect longevity out of it.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaK47

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely lightweight, and perfect for travel. They fit as expected. Time will tell about their durability. There is essentially no support, so I'm not sure how good their are as a running shoe, but they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Smooth...
customer_reviews.text: Very breathable and comfy and small in size to fit perfectly into a gym bag
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe slipper
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but it is more like a home slipper. Great for around the house and if you want to run to the store.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light and comfortable. I just don't do legs for fear of ...
customer_reviews.text: Still my go to gym shoes. Extremely light and comfortable. I just don't do legs for fear of the mesh front ripping
customer_reviews.author: Jamazon

customer_reviews.title: Large mesh hole pattern. Gotta ware same color socks as shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very breathable, I mean like more ventilation than water shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S Smart

product_meta.title: JUAN Men's Lightweight Slip On Mesh Sneakers Outdoor Athletic Running Shoes Casual Sport Shoes
product_meta.description: Functional hybrid-style shoe optimized for runnning and everyday activities. For a tighter fit or with barefeet Order as usual (Shoes will loosen up after a few hours) Ultra lightweight design provides actual feelings of being barefooted for a more comfortable and natural walk. Hydrofit (Quick-dry function) Integrated vent-mesh upper design maximizes the surface area and keeps your foot cool. Hydrophobic vent-mesh gives the wearer advanced aeration. Vent mesh (Specialized dual structure) Unique dual vent mesh structure offers incredible breathability and quick drying properties. Dual vent mesh construction allows feet to move more dynamically. Synthetic Skin Suede High-quality synthetic skin suede increases durability and stain resistant. Flex groove (Flexible movement- flex groove sole) Flex groove sole with hydro-grip outsole provides excellent traction and stability for various surfaces and terrains. Multi-directional flexible groove and cushioned insole gives balance during sports activities. Dura glide (Excellent durability EVA midsole) Optimal formulation of thermoplastic polymer with advanced technology provides for a less stiff and sturdy EVA midsole. Foldable heel tap Fold-down heel cup supplements can make simple slip-on easier. Durable and soft heel taps prevent abrasions from occurring. "
feature_bullets: Slip resistant razar EVA cushion sole
Your feet can breathe easy in the latest iteration of fabric upper
Engineered one piece mesh upper that offers ventilation right where you need it
Quick-dry function : Integrated vent-mesh upper design maximizes the surface area and keeps your foot cool.
